attributes.action: Close bus lanes and allow them for normal use
attributes.background: bus lanes are useless because i feel that it just gives priority to users of public transport whereas road users that pay for road tax and insurance to drive are given less priority causing delays and congestion.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Bus lanes are the responsibility of your local council or, if you live in London, Transport for London.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

If you live in London, you may wish to contact your local London Assembly Member, whose details can be found here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/people/assembly
